name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 2
overview: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 2 (also known as Maximum Tune 2, or simply Maxi 2) is an arcade racing video game developed and published by NAMCO and based on the Wangan Midnight manga. It is the sequel to Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune and a third entry of the Wangan Midnight arcade series and was released in 2005 in both Japan and the United States.
